document.full_text: thousands of pilgrims made their way to el santuario de chimayo this easter weekend, believing that a miraculous soil associated with the church will heal their pains and cleanse their sins.
document.title: new mexico church draws pilgrims seeking miracles
lines_and_colors: thousands of pilgrims made their way to el santuario de chimayo this easter weekend, believing that a miraculous soil associated with the church will heal their pains and cleanse their sins.
